item.title: Announcing January PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: Dear community, The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, January 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! Public Demo is now called Live update, as it is planned to experiment with formats other than you could see in previous sessions, like live coding, interviews, etc. This time, as always, I expect to share with you project news, and a couple of demos are planned:
